briefTitle: Pilot Study of ACTH in the Treatment of Immunoglobulin A (IgA) Nephropathy at High Risk of Progression
officialTitle: An Open-Label Pilot Study of ACTH in the Treatment of IgA Nephropathy at High Risk of Progression
summary: This study is designed to answer whether patients with progressive IgA nephropathy, who receive Acthar (ACTH) gel injection at a dose of 80 units subcutaneously twice weekly for 6 months is effective in inducing improvement in proteinuria and renal function.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Subjects With a Complete or Partial Response to Treatment
